officers.name: Rory Zahedi
officers.description: Hello, my name is Rory! I’m a fourth-year CS BS/MS student and the president of the club! Academically, my interests lie in the systems area of CS, as well in programming languages. Outside of class, I recreationally enjoy weightlifting, rock climbing, surfing, and cycling! If you ever have any questions or want to just chat please contact me at neemazahedi@ucsb.edu!

officers.name: Steven Man
officers.description: Hi, I’m Steven Man, a second-year Mechanical Engineering major and I’m the VP external for the Robotics club. I love making and building and helping you with anything CAD or engineering!

officers.name: Rafee Qureshi
officers.description: I am a fourth-year double major in Biochemistry and Cell & Developmental Biology at UCSB.  Although not in the engineering department, I was involved in an engineering program for 4 years in high school prior to my time at UCSB and have 4 years of experience as a project lead for my high school’s VEX robotics team.  Besides this experience, I have also been a part of UCSB’s IEEE for a year and am entering both my 3rd year in UCSB’s Robotics club and 2nd year as an officer.  I look forward to meeting, teaching, and providing members, both new and old, a memorable club experience come fall 2021.

officers.name: Jennifer Park
officers.description: Hey I’m Jen, a third-year Statistics & Data Science and Economics & Accounting major. I serve as the guap guardian, guardian of the guap. In my free time, I win Cambio, read shareholder letters, and touch grass.

officers.name: Vedad Bassari
officers.description: Interested in hardware design, fabrication, and integration in the context of mechatronics.

officers.name: Erin DeLong
officers.description: Hi, I’m Erin and I’m a second-year Computer Science major!

officers.name: William Huang
officers.description: Hello, my name is William Huang and I am currently a CS major at UCSB. I hope to help make the Robotics Club a fun experience for everyone. In terms of personal hobbies, I enjoy reading, playing video games, water polo, and coding in the middle of the night.

officers.name: Matthew Ho
officers.description: Second-year CS major. Relatively new to robotics, but eager to learn. Enjoys Nintendo games and bubble tea and dislikes sour foods.

officers.name: Aditya Ramakrishnan
officers.description: Hey! I'm Aditya, a second-year Electrical Engineering major and your Co-Electrical Lead for the quarter. In my free time, I love to play video games, read sci-fi, listen to music, and bike outside. I am looking forward to working with you all and learning new things along the way!

officers.name: Spencer Tang
officers.description: Hey everyone, my name is Spencer and I'm a second-year majoring in Computer Engineering. I'll be one of the electrical leads this year. I look forward to meeting everyone! :D

officers.name: Dylan Vu
officers.description: Hey, I'm Dylan, your Webmaster! I'm about to become a third-year CE (Chemical Engineering) major but I'm taking a gap year. In my spare time, I like to game with my friends and expand my knowledge of coding by tackling various side projects.
